title: New client Alpha tester question
body: I was wondering if I can get bans and similar stuff if I crash in champ select (due to new client bugs). Thanks!

replies.body:
Yup, Leaverbuster and /Remake work the same way with the Alpha Client. I've been using it for a while and have yet to experience it crashing or doing anything super funky to cause me to drop out of champ select.

Let me know if you have any questions.
